title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2014
content:
19th December, 2014 Statutory Instruments 177
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 66 OF 2014
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2014
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section three of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is hereby issued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration) Notice, 2014.
2. It is declared that Friday, 26th December, 2014 and Friday, Declaration
2nd January, 2015, shall be observed as public holidays in view of of public
holiday
the fact that Christmas day and New Yearâ€™s day fall on Thursday,
25th December, 2014, and Thursday, 1st January, 2015, respectively.
DR GUY L. SCOTT,
LUSAKA Acting President
17th December, 2014
[CO.53/8/11]
